`al=k*en<PAS> t*Ap<MUN>w*g t*worA<ZQP>h w@lo<SIL>'=yeYe<MER>' lAnE<TIP>Yax miW/.@p*A<ATN>T k*i<MEH>y rAW/.A`<PAS> mak@t*i<MUN>yr 'Et=haY*ad*i<ZQP>yq `al=k*e<TEB>n yeYe<MER>' miW/.@p*A<TIP>T m@`uq*A<SIL>l:
r@'<MEH>w* bag*woyim<PAS> w@<SIL>hab*i<ZQP>yTw* w@hi<SIL>t*am*@h<TIP>w* t*@mA<ATN>hw* k*iy=po<AZL>`al<PAS> p*o`e<MUN>l b*i<SIL>ymeykE<ZQP>m lo<MER>' ta<SIL>'<HPA>mi<TIP>ynw* k*i<MER>y y@sup*A<SIL>r:

'Ayo<MER>m w@nworA<TIP>' h<ATN>w*' mim*E<ZQM>n*w* miW/.@p*AT<MER>wo w*W/ׂ@'et<TIP>wo yeYe<SIL>':

w@qal*<AZL>w* min*@meri<GER>ym sw*sA<RBM>yw w@xad*w*<PAS> miz*@'e<MUN>bey `E<ZQP>rEb w*pA<TIP>W/.w* p*A<SIL>rAW/.A<ATN>yw w*pA<SIL>rAW/.Ayw<PAS> me<SIL>rAx<MUN>woq yAbo<ZQP>'w* yA`u<ZQM>pw* k*@nE<TIP>W/.Er xA<MER>W/. lE<SIL>'<HSE>k<SIL>wol:

w@hw*'<PAS> b*am*@lAki<MUN>ym yit@qal*A<ZQP>s w@ro<SIL>z@ni<TIP>ym miW/ׂ@xA<MUN>q l<ATN>wo h<YET>w*' l@kAl=mib@YA<MUN>r yiW/ׂ@xA<ZQP>q way*iY@b*o<MER>r `ApA<TIP>r wa<SIL>y*il@k*@dA<SIL>h*:
'A<MUN>z xAla<MER>p r<TEB>w*xa wa<SIL>y*a`<HPA>bo<TIP>r w@'AW/.e<ATN>m z<MER>w* kox<TIP>wo le<SIL>'loh<SIL>wo:
h<HPA>l<DAR>wo' 'at*A<MUN>h miq*E<RBM>dEm y@hwA<DAR>h '<HSE>loha<TEB>y q@doW/.i<TIP>y lo<MUN>' nAm<ATN>w*t y@hwAh<PAS> l@miW/.@p*A<MUN>T W/ׂam@t*<ZQP>wo w@Y<TIP>w*r l@hwoki<MER>yxa y@sad@t*<SIL>wo:

`al=k*en<PAS> y@zab*e<MUN>xa l@xEr@m<ZQP>wo wi<SIL>yqaT*e<TIP>r l@mik@mar@t*<ATN>wo k*i<MEH>y bAhe<AZL>m*Ah<PAS> W/.Ame<MUN>n xEl@q<ZQP>wo w*ma<SIL>'<HPA>kAl<TIP>wo b*@ri'A<SIL>h:

t*@pil*A<TIP>h la<SIL>x<HPA>baq*<MUN>w*q han*Abi<ATN>y' `a<TIP>l W/.ig@yon<SIL>wot:

y@hwA<RBM>h W/.Ama<MUN>`@t*iy W/.im@`<HPA>kA<ZIN> yAre'tiy<AST> y@hwA<RBM>h p*A<SIL>`Al@kA<PAS> b*@qE<MEH>rEb W/.Aniym<PAS> xay*e<ZQP>yhw* b*@qE<MER>rEb W/.Ani<TIP>ym t*wodi<ATN>y`a b*@ro<TIP>gEz raxe<MER>m t*iz@k*<SIL>wor:
'<HSE>l<AZL>woh*a<PAS> mit*eymA<MUN>n yAb<ZQP>wo' w@qAd<MER>woW/. me<SIL>har=p*A'rA<TIP>n sE<ATN>lAh k*is*A<MEH>h W/.Ama<AZL>yim<PAS> hwod<ZQP>wo w*t@hil*At<TIP>wo mA<SIL>l@'A<MER>h hA'A<SIL>rEY:
w@no<AZL>gah*<PAS> k*A'<MUN>wor t*i<SIL>h@yE<ZQP>h qar@na<MER>yim miy*Ad<TIP>wo l<ATN>wo w@W/.A<TIP>m xEb@y<MER>won `uz*o<SIL>h:
l@pAnA<TIP>yw ye<MUN>lEk@ d*A<ATN>bEr w@yeYe<MER>' rE<TIP>W/.Ep l@rag@lA<SIL>yw:

`Ama<MUN>d | way@mo<MUN>dEd 'E<RBM>rEY rA'Ah<PAS> way*at*e<MUN>r g*woyi<ZQP>m way*it@p*o<SIL>Y@Yw*<PAS> har@rey=`a<ZQP>d W/.ax<TIP>w* g*ib@`<MUN>wot `wolA<ATN>m h<HPA>liyk<MER>wot `wolA<TIP>m l<SIL>wo:
t*a<MUN>xat 'A<ZQP>wEn rA'i<TIP>ytiy 'A<SIL>h<HQA>le<MUN>y kw*W/.A<ATN>n yir@g*@z<ZQM>w*n y@riy`<TIP>wot 'E<MER>rEY mid@yA<SIL>n:
h<HPA>bin@hAriym<PAS> xArA<MUN>h y@hwA<ZQP>h 'i<MEH>m b*an*@hAriym<PAS> 'ap*E<ZQP>kA 'im=b*ay*A<TIP>m `Eb@rAtE<ATN>kA k*i<MEH>y tir@k*ab<PAS> `al=sw*sE<ZQP>ykA mar@k*@botE<TIP>ykA y@W/.w*`A<SIL>h:
`Er@yA<MEH>h te`wor<PAS> qaW/.@t*E<ZQP>kA W/.@bu`<MER>wot maT*<TIP>wot 'o<MUN>mEr sE<ATN>lAh n@hAr<TIP>wot t*@baq*a`='A<SIL>rEY:
rA'<MEH>w*kA yAxi<AZL>ylw*<PAS> hAri<ZQP>ym zE<MER>rEm ma<TIP>yim `AbA<ATN>r nAta<MEH>n t*@hwom<PAS> qwol<ZQP>wo r<TIP>wom yAde<MER>yhw* nAW/ׂA<SIL>':
W/.E<MER>mEW/. yAre<TIP>xa `A<MUN>mad z@bu<ATN>lAh l@'<MEH>wor xiY*E<AZL>ykA<PAS> y@hal*e<ZQP>kw* l@no<TIP>gah* b*@ra<MER>q x<HPA>niytE<SIL>kA:

`al=miW/.@mar@t*i<MUN>y 'E<SIL>`<HSE>mo<ZQP>dAh w@'E<SIL>t@yaY*@bA<TIP>h `al=mAY<ATN>wor wa<SIL>'<HPA>Yap*E<RBM>h lir@'wot<PAS> mah=y@dab*Er=b*i<ZQP>y w*mA<MER>h 'AW/.i<TIP>yb `al=t*<SIL>wokax@t*i<SIL>y:
way*a<SIL>`<HPA>ne<MEH>niy y@hwAh<PAS> way*o<ZQP>'mEr k*@to<MUN>b xAz<ZQP>won w*bA'e<TIP>r `al=hal*ux<ATN>wot l@ma<MER>`an yAr<TIP>w*Y q<MER>wore' b<SIL>wo:
k*i<MUN>y `<MEH>wod xAzwon<PAS> lam*wo`e<ZQP>d w@yApe<MER>xa laq*e<TIP>Y w@lo<MUN>' y@kaz*e<ATN>b 'im=yit@mah@mAh*<PAS> xak*eh=l<ZQP>wo k*iy=bo<MER>' yAbo<TIP>' lo<MER>' y@'axe<SIL>r:
hin*e<MUN>h `up*@lA<ZQP>h lo<SIL>'=yAW/.@rA<MER>h nap@W/.<TIP>wo b*<ATN>wo w@Yad*i<TIP>yq b*E'<HSE>m<SIL>w*nAt<MER>wo yi<SIL>x@yE<SIL>h:

h<HPA>l<MUN>wo' pE<RBM>ta` yAq<AZL>w*mw*<PAS> no<SIL>W/.@kE<ZQP>ykA w@yiq@Y<TIP>w* m@za`@z@`E<ATN>ykA w@hAyi<MER>ytA lim@W/.is*<TIP>wot lA<SIL>mwo:

k*i<SIL>y='at*A<MEH>h W/.al*<AZL>wotA<PAS> g*woyi<MUN>m rab*i<ZQP>ym y@W/.Al*<TIP>w*kA k*Al=yE<MUN>tEr `am*i<ATN>ym mid*@me<MEH>y 'AdAm<PAS> wa<SIL>x<HPA>mas='E<ZQP>rEY qir@yA<TIP>h w@kAl=yo<MER>W/.@bey bA<SIL>h*:
h<RBM>woy b*oYe<TEB>`a b*E<MER>Ya` rA<TIP>` l@beyt<ATN>wo lAW/ׂ<MEH>w*m b*am*Arwom<PAS> qin*<ZQP>wo l@hin*AYe<TIP>l mik*ap=rA<SIL>`:

k*iy='E<TIP>bEn miq*i<MUN>yr t*iz@`A<ATN>q w@kApi<TIP>ys me`e<MER>Y ya<SIL>`<HPA>nE<SIL>n*Ah:
h<TEB>woy b*onE<MER>h `i<TIP>yr b*@dAmi<ATN>ym w@kwone<MER>n qir@yA<TIP>h b*@`aw@lA<SIL>h:

W/ׂAba<MEH>`@t*A qAlwon<PAS> mik*Ab<ZQP>wod W/.@te<MER>h gam='a<TIP>t*Ah w@he<SIL>`Are<ATN>l t*is*<MUN>wob `AlE<RBM>ykA k*<YET>wos y@mi<MUN>yn y@hwA<ZQP>h w@qi<SIL>yqAl<TIP>won `al=k*@bwodE<SIL>kA:

wa<SIL>yhwA<TIP>h b*@heyka<MUN>l qAd@W/.<ATN>wo ha<MER>s mip*AnA<TIP>yw k*Al=hA'A<SIL>rEY:
